content:
DataGridEditAction Enum

Definition

Defines constants that specify whether an edit is being canceled or committed.

In this Article

public enum DataGridEditAction
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DataGridEditAction

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the EditAction and EditAction properties.

Fields

Cancel

The edit is being canceled.
Commit

The edit is being committed.
